title: Platinum Games Isn't Sold On NFTs... Yet
description:
Tim and Tam talk about Platinum Games' skepticism towards NFTs, Elden Ring spoilers, Street Fighter x Magic The Gathering, And More

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:28 - Housekeeping

This morning, the one and only Nitro Rifle, Andy Cortez, posted his first hour of gameplay for Horizon Forbidden West on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames!

Keep your eyes and ears locked to youtube.com/KindaFunny and the Screencast podcast feed because the Peacemaker finale review will be up later today.

Lock On Volume 3 - https://bit.ly/3GY1S4L 

The Roper Report -

00:08:39 - Steam Deck Replacement Parts Will Be Officially Sold Through iFixit
00:13:44 - Elden Ring Fans Beware: Spoilers Are Out There
00:18:45 - Platinum Games: NFTs Could Become Important, But First Examples Are Not Great
00:29:02 - Street Fighter MTG Crossover Cards and February Secret Lairs Revealed
00:36:30 - Ads 00:02:05 - Ad Length
00:38:35 - Out today
00:44:53 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Jordan Ramee from Gamespot
